name: Bigboss Custom Post Type Widget
author: Bulbul bigboss

sections.description:
Bigboss CPT (Custom post type ) widget for displaying the latest posts of any post type including custom types.
Control the widget title formatting and the number of posts to display. Plus the widget is completely localized for other languages.
If you face any problem then contact with me or see more about bigboss cpt post widget
plugins

Basic Use

then go to apprearance > widget > Bigboss cpt post widget > Bigboss Latest Custom Posts
just drug and drop where you want to display this plugin

select your custom post type , select number of post you want to show

if you face any problem then please contact with me bbthemebd/about-us

Show Your Custom post type post in Sidebar
sections.installation:
How To install Bigboss cpt post widget on your wordpress site
1.Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

3.Go to widget area and just drop and drop
sections.faq:
What is main Functionality of this plugin?

You Can Show Your Custom Post Type post in sidebar area using this Plugin?

Can I Show All Recent Post?

No. You can Show only custom post type Recent post.

How Many Custom Post Type I add in Sidebar?

Unlimited? There is No limit to it.

Can I use it in Page Builder like Visual Customizer?

Yes.You can use it in all major wp page builder.

Is it Responsive?

Yes. it depends on your Theme responsiveness.
